info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:14PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Borden, northern Martin, northwestern Howard and southern Dawson Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 814 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ackerly, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ackerly, Sparenberg, Tenmile, Patricia, Knott, Vealmoor, Klondike and Tarzan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
